requirement_tested: A frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
user_persona: A first-time user exploring the coaching platform.
user_goal: To view the list of available coaches fetched dynamically from the backend.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting the Coaches Page
narrative_steps.description: Alex navigates to the 'Find a Coach' section expecting to see a list of coaches.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Find a Coach' navigation link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The frontend makes an API call to /coaches/search and displays a grid of coach profiles retrieved from the backend.

requirement_tested: A backend API server that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: A developer testing the backend service.
user_goal: Verify that the backend successfully connects to the PostgreSQL database.

narrative_steps.title: Making an API Request
narrative_steps.description: Developer sends a GET request to retrieve user data to confirm database connectivity.
narrative_steps.action: Send GET request to /api/users.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server responds with user data retrieved from the PostgreSQL database using the configured environment variables.

requirement_tested: User authentication and authorization system for coaches and users
user_persona: A new user signing up for the platform.
user_goal: To register as a user and log in successfully.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Registration
narrative_steps.description: Taylor visits the site and decides to sign up as a user.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Sign Up' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Registration form appears with fields for name, email, password, and role selection.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Valid Credentials
narrative_steps.description: Taylor fills in valid details and selects 'User' as the role.
narrative_steps.action: Fill form fields and click 'Register'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Account is created, and Taylor is redirected to the login page with a success message.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In
narrative_steps.description: Taylor logs in with newly registered credentials.
narrative_steps.action: Enter email and password, then click 'Login'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: JWT token is stored, and Taylor is redirected to the user dashboard.

requirement_tested: Personality assessment functionality with interactive questionnaire interface
user_persona: A user interested in finding compatible coaches.
user_goal: Complete the personality assessment to get matched with suitable coaches.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Assessment
narrative_steps.description: Jordan clicks to begin the personality assessment.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Start Personality Assessment'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: First question is displayed with multiple choice options.

narrative_steps.title: Answering Questions
narrative_steps.description: Jordan answers several questions by selecting options and navigating forward.
narrative_steps.action: Select answers and click 'Next' through each question.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each answer is saved locally and the next question is shown.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Assessment
narrative_steps.description: After answering all questions, Jordan reviews and submits the assessment.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Submit' on the final review screen.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Assessment data is sent to backend and Jordan is redirected to the matching results page.

requirement_tested: User profile creation and management with editable personal information
user_persona: An existing user wanting to update their profile.
user_goal: Update their bio and avatar in the profile settings.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Profile
narrative_steps.description: Casey goes to their profile page to make updates.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the profile page and click 'Edit Profile'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Editable form fields appear for name, email, bio, and avatar upload.

narrative_steps.title: Updating Information
narrative_steps.description: Casey uploads a new avatar and writes a new bio.
narrative_steps.action: Upload image and type new bio in respective fields.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: New values are reflected in the input fields.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Changes
narrative_steps.description: Casey saves the updated profile information.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Save Changes'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Updated profile data is saved to backend and the profile page reflects the changes.

requirement_tested: Coach profile creation and management with specialization and experience details
user_persona: A coach updating their professional details.
user_goal: Modify their specialization and hourly rate in the coach profile.

narrative_steps.title: Editing Coach Profile
narrative_steps.description: Riley accesses the coach dashboard and edits their profile.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Edit Coach Profile'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form fields for specializations, experience, and hourly rate become editable.

narrative_steps.title: Changing Specialization and Rate
narrative_steps.description: Riley adds a new specialization and updates their hourly rate.
narrative_steps.action: Add new specialization and change hourly rate field value.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Fields update with new values.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Updates
narrative_steps.description: Riley saves the updated coach profile.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Save Changes'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Changes are saved to the backend and displayed on the public coach profile.

requirement_tested: Search and filtering functionality for users to find suitable coaches
user_persona: A user looking for career-focused coaches within budget.
user_goal: Use filters to find affordable career coaches.

narrative_steps.title: Searching Coaches
narrative_steps.description: Morgan types 'career' into the search bar to look for relevant coaches.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'career' into the search input.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Search results update dynamically showing coaches specializing in career development.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Filters
narrative_steps.description: Morgan applies filters to narrow down the results.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'Career' under specialization and adjust price slider to maximum $100/hour.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Filtered results load showing only career coaches within the selected price range.

requirement_tested: Matching algorithm or mechanism to suggest coaches based on personality assessment results
user_persona: A user who just finished their personality assessment.
user_goal: View coach recommendations based on personality match.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Matching Results
narrative_steps.description: After completing the assessment, Alex lands on the matching results page.
narrative_steps.action: Page loads automatically.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Recommended coaches with compatibility scores are displayed based on assessment results.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring a Match
narrative_steps.description: Alex clicks on a highly compatible coach to learn more.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a coach card from the recommendations list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Full coach profile page opens with detailed information and compatibility explanation.

requirement_tested: Scheduling system for booking one-to-one coaching sessions
user_persona: A user ready to book a session with a chosen coach.
user_goal: Book a coaching session at an available time.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting a Time Slot
narrative_steps.description: Jamie views the coach's availability and picks a convenient time.
narrative_steps.action: Click on an available time slot in the calendar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Booking confirmation modal appears with selected date and time.

narrative_steps.title: Confirming Booking
narrative_steps.description: Jamie confirms the session booking.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Confirm Booking' in the modal.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Session is booked in backend and Jamie receives a confirmation notification.

requirement_tested: Session management dashboard to view upcoming and past coaching sessions
user_persona: A user checking their scheduled sessions.
user_goal: Review upcoming and past coaching sessions.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Upcoming Sessions
narrative_steps.description: Patricia navigates to the session dashboard to see future appointments.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Sessions' tab and ensure 'Upcoming Sessions' is active.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: List of upcoming sessions with dates, coach names, and statuses is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Switching to Past Sessions
narrative_steps.description: Patricia switches to view previously attended sessions.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Past Sessions' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: List updates to show completed and cancelled sessions from the past.

requirement_tested: Goal setting interface allowing users to define personalized coaching objectives
user_persona: A user starting their coaching journey with specific goals.
user_goal: Set a new personal development goal.

narrative_steps.title: Creating a New Goal
narrative_steps.description: Drew wants to add a goal to improve communication skills.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Goals' and then 'Add New Goal'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Goal creation form with title, description, target date, and category appears.

narrative_steps.title: Defining Goal Details
narrative_steps.description: Drew fills in the goal information.
narrative_steps.action: Enter 'Improve Communication Skills' as title, choose 'Personal' category, and set a target date.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form captures Drew's inputs accurately.

narrative_steps.title: Saving the Goal
narrative_steps.description: Drew submits the new goal.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Save Goal'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Goal is added to Drew's list and stored in the backend.

requirement_tested: Progress tracking visualization to monitor goal achievement over time
user_persona: A user reviewing their coaching progress.
user_goal: Check visual progress toward achieving their goals.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Progress Charts
narrative_steps.description: Sam navigates to the progress tracking section to evaluate performance.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Progress Tracking' in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Charts displaying progress data for active goals appear with default monthly view.

narrative_steps.title: Changing Time Frame
narrative_steps.description: Sam wants to see yearly progress instead.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'Yearly' from the timeframe toggle.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Chart updates to show progress aggregated by year.

requirement_tested: Responsive web design with beige background and saddle brown colored components
user_persona: A user accessing the app on different devices.
user_goal: Experience consistent styling and responsive layout on mobile and desktop.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Desktop Layout
narrative_steps.description: On a laptop, Morgan browses the homepage.
narrative_steps.action: Open homepage in browser window.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Beige background and saddle brown components are applied consistently across all sections.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Mobile Responsiveness
narrative_steps.description: Morgan resizes the browser to simulate mobile usage.
narrative_steps.action: Resize browser window to mobile dimensions.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adjusts responsively while maintaining correct colors and readability.

requirement_tested: Package.json configuration with 'install:all' script for frontend and backend installation
user_persona: A developer setting up the project locally.
user_goal: Install dependencies for both frontend and backend simultaneously.

narrative_steps.title: Running Install Script
narrative_steps.description: Dev wants to quickly install all project dependencies.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run install:all` in root directory terminal.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both client and server folders install dependencies concurrently without errors.

requirement_tested: Package.json configuration with 'dev' script to start frontend and backend concurrently
user_persona: A developer beginning work on the application.
user_goal: Launch both frontend and backend servers for development.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: Dev needs to run both services for integrated development.
narrative_steps.action: Execute `npm run dev` in the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend development server and backend API server start side-by-side and are accessible.
